faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Menur
faq.a1: Menur is a digital menu platform designed for restaurants in Saudi Arabia. It lets you create beautiful digital menus, generate custom QR codes, and track scan analytics — all from one dashboard.
faq.a2: Yes! Menur offers a free plan that includes 1 menu, 1 QR code, and basic features. You can upgrade anytime to unlock more menus, analytics, and customization options.
faq.q3: Can I customize the QR code?
faq.a3: Absolutely. You can customize your QR code colors, add your restaurant logo, and create unique codes for each table or location.
faq.a4: Yes, Menur is fully bilingual (Arabic and English) with complete RTL support. Your menu can be displayed in multiple languages for all your customers.
faq.a5: Yes! Depending on your plan, you can create multiple menus — for example, a breakfast menu, lunch menu, and dinner menu, each with their own QR codes.
faq.q6: How do I cancel my subscription?
faq.a6: You can cancel your subscription anytime from your dashboard settings. Your menu will remain active until the end of your billing period, then you'll be downgraded to the free plan.

about.title: About Menur
about.heroText: We're building the future of restaurant menus in Saudi Arabia
about.missionText: To empower every restaurant in Saudi Arabia with beautiful, accessible digital menus that enhance the dining experience for both owners and guests.
about.whatWeOfferText: Menur is an all-in-one digital menu platform that helps restaurants create stunning menus, generate custom QR codes, and gain insights through scan analytics. Whether you're a small café or a multi-location chain, Menur scales with your needs.
about.whyMenurText: Built specifically for the Saudi market, Menur supports Arabic and English with full RTL layout, includes VAT-compliant pricing, and is designed to meet the needs of restaurants across the Kingdom. Our mission is to make going digital simple, affordable, and effective.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have a question or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.sent: Message sent! We'll get back to you soon.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Menur, we take your privacy seriously. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy.dataCollectionText: We collect information you provide when creating an account, such as your name, email address, and restaurant details. We also collect usage data including scan analytics, device information, and browsing patterns to improve our services.
privacy.cookiesText: We use essential cookies to keep you logged in and remember your preferences. We do not use tracking cookies for advertising purposes.
privacy.usageText: Your information is used to provide and improve our services, process transactions, send important notifications, and provide customer support. We never sell your personal data to third parties.
privacy.sharingText: We only share your data with service providers who help us operate the platform (such as hosting and email services). We require all third parties to respect the security of your data.
privacy.rightsText: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time from your dashboard settings. You can also request a copy of your data by contacting us.
privacy.securityText: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encryption in transit and at rest.
privacy.changesText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes via email or through our platform.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using Menur, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.
terms.acceptanceText: By accessing or using Menur, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use the platform.
terms.accountsText: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and password. You must provide accurate information when creating an account and keep it updated. One person or entity may not maintain more than one free account.
terms.contentText: You retain ownership of the content you upload to Menur (menus, images, descriptions). By uploading content, you grant us a license to display it as part of our service. You are responsible for ensuring you have the right to use any content you upload.
terms.acceptableUseText: You agree not to misuse our services. This includes attempting to access unauthorized areas, interfering with other users, uploading harmful content, or using the platform for any illegal purpose.
terms.paymentText: Paid plans are billed monthly. All prices include 15% VAT. You can cancel anytime, and your subscription will remain active until the end of your current billing period.
terms.liabilityText: Menur is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the platform.
terms.terminationText: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms. You may delete your account at any time from your dashboard settings.
terms.changesText: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of Menur after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
